qr.text1: Scan the QR Code through PLAY WALLET
qr.step2: Click the icon on the top
qr.other1: Available to scan with other QR Code readers.
qr.text2: Verification will be done through WEMIX Wallet.
qr.step3.mobile: Go back to the page after verification
qr.allow.popup.mobile: If WEMIX Wallet does not run, please unlock the pop-up block.
qr.help.title: How can we help you?
qr.help.sub1: If you have a question, please request for help in Inquiry menu.
qr.help.sub2: More details you provide, quick and precise solution will be given.
